document.description: can be a base64 or a HTTPS URL

date.description: The date the document was issued.
date.title: Date of Issue

dates.description: List of dates found on the document.
dates.title: Dates

issuer_address.description: The address of the document's issuer.

value.example: 548 Market St, Suite 98568 San Francisco, California 94104-5401
value.title: Value

issuer_address.title: Issuer Address

issuer_company_registration.description: List of company registrations found for the issuer.

type.description: Generic: VAT NUMBER, TAX ID, COMPANY REGISTRATION NUMBER or country specific: TIN (United States), GST/HST (Canada), SIREN/SIRET (France), UEN (Singapore), STNR (Germany), KVK (NL), CIF (Spain), NIF (Portugal), CVR (Denmark), CF (Italy), DIC (Czech Republic), RFC (Mexico), GSTIN (India), etc
type.title: Type

issuer_company_registration.title: Issuer Company Registrations

issuer_name.description: The name of the person or company issuing the document.
issuer_name.title: Issuer Name

locale.description: The locale detected on the document.

currency.description: The ISO 4217 code of the currency.
currency.title: Currency

language.description: The ISO 639-1 code of the language.
language.title: Language

locale.title: Locale

value.example: 548 Market St, Suite 98568 San Francisco, California 94104-5401
